model_answer:
The answer is C: A weather bubble showing current conditions (e.g., temperature and wind).

The narrator mentions that with this app, you can get bubble clouds on your phones and tablets' home screens, as well as on the screen of your Android Wear smartwatch if you have one. The weather bubble displays live info such as the current date, daily steps, and weather conditions in real-time. This means that it is always showing the current weather conditions on your device.
The visual indicator that appears at the same time as the sticky open mode is option C: A colorful grid of app icons with a clock and microphone icon in the center.
